other_title: メカクシティアクターズ (Japanese)
plot: The incidents which occurred on August 14th and 15th bring a group of young boys and girls together… They are members of a group they call themselves the "Mekakushi Dan" (Blindfold Organization) and each member possesses a strange power involving their eyes.
opening_theme: "Ayano's Theory of Happiness" (アヤノの幸福理論; Ayano no Kōfuku Riron) by Jin ft. Aki Okui (ep 9)
"Daze" by Jin ft. MARIA from GARNiDELiA
ending_theme: "Lost Time Memory" by Jin ft. Kōta Matsuyama from Byee the Round (ep 8)
"Summertime Record" by Jin ft. Takuro Sugawara (ep 12)
"Yūkei Yesterday" (夕景イエスタデイ) by Jin ft. LiSA (ep 6)
insert_song: "Fantasy Forest" (空想フォレスト; Kūsō Forest) by Jin ft. Takumi Yoshida from phatmans after school (ep 10)
"Kagerou Daze" (カゲロウデイズ) by Jin ft. Shōichi Taguchi from Sentimental Vector (ep 4)
"Kisaragi Attention" (如月アテンション) by Jin ft. Luna Haruna (ep 2)
"Mekakushi Code" (メカクシコード) by Jin ft. Koneko Yasagure (ep 3)
"Otsukimi Recital" (オツキミリサイタル) by Jin ft. IA (ep 11)
